StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: * Offering 2 years of experience as a Business Development Manager in the field of Education Sales * Successfully completed PGP in Data Science from International School of Engineering (INSOFE), Hyderabad in 2019 * Knowledge in deep learning technologies to develop prototypes and analytic models through the application of new, innovative capabilities * Skills in defining business problems, manipulating data, developing data science and analytical algorithms & solutions * Proficient in performing market research through industry contacts, telephonic contacts and personal meetings to identify ideas for growth * Technical expertise in: R, Python, EDA, Data Visualization using Matplotlib and Seaborn, Machine Learning and AI models, Neural Networks, NLP, Deep Learning Techniques, LSTM * Possess sound critical thinking skills & work ethics with high degree of curiosity; ability to constantly push personal boundaries to new levels
